item.title: CVE-2023-41747|2024-03-18T19:42:59.218Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cloud%20manager
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to improper input validation. The following products are affected: Acronis Cloud Manager (Windows) before build 6.2.23089.203.
